info.title: Merkle API
info.description: API documentation for all publicly exposed APIs provided by Merkle Manufactory, Inc for Farcaster V2.

get.description: Returns whether the server is healthy and responding to requests.
Gets all asset-related events for the specified user.
Gets details about the specified asset.
Gets all assets owned by a given user for a specific collection.
Gets all casts (including replies and recasts) created by the specified user.

post.description: Creates a cast for the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Get all reactions to a cast.

put.description: Create a reaction to a cast.

delete.description: Remove a reaction from a cast.

get.description: Get all users who recasted a cast.
Get details about a collection of assets.
Get all collections owned by the specified user.
Get all asset events related to the given collection.
Get all users who own at least one asset from the specified collection.
Get information about a Farcaster username (fname).
Get all users that follow the specified user.
Get all users the specified user is following.
Get notifications where the authenticated user was mentioned.
Gets the specified user via their FID.
Gets the specified user via their username.
Get all verifications for the authenticated user.

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Endpoints related to credentials for interacting with the API. See https://www.notion.so/farcasterxyz/Authenticating-with-the-Merkle-V2-API-06226da351f447358a783b438b2aefdd

tags.name: assets
tags.description: Endpoints related to NFTs and other assets

tags.name: notifications
tags.description: Endpoints related to notifications for the authenticated user
